videos.title: BTS of I Choose You!
videos.description:
Don't miss this behind-the-scenes look from our latest teen praise music video from #strivetobe. Keep your eyes out for the full-length music video coming soon! Share how you choose Jesus Christ in the comments below. 

Artist: Sadie Emolyn
Words and Music by: Alyson Day and Nik Day
Arranged by: Alex Dantas and Mitch Davis
Produced by: Alex Dantas and Mitch Davis

Piano: Brooklyn Clark
Guitar: Trenton Trimble
Percussion: Julio Rojas

Chapters:
00:00 - 00:09 Introduction
00:10 - 00:24 Behind the scenes 
00:25 - 00:36 Ending

🎧 Lyrics

I was frozen,
Didn’t know which way I was going,
Standing at the door never knowing
What would happen on the other side.
I was sinking,
Trying to turn back time, hesitating.
I got tired of silently fading,
So I turned to the light.

Chorus:

I choose You.
You are my answer,
And I choose You.
I’m Yours forever.
You’re the peace in the storm. You’re the fire in the cold.
You’re the wind that carries me through.
And I choose You.
I was shaking,
But I faced my fears, and I’m changing.
And I’m on my way. Walls are breaking,
And hope is burning bright.
No more sitting and wishing or silent resisting,
I’m giving into Your love.
And I’ve traveled to places that never existed
Before I said You’re the one.

Chorus:

I choose You.
You are my answer,
And I choose You.
You are my Savior.
You’re the peace in the storm. You’re the fire in the cold.
You’re the wind that carries me through.

And I choose You.

Mmm

Final Chorus

I choose You.
You are my answer,
And I choose You.
You are my Savior.
You’re the peace in the storm. You’re the fire in the cold.
You’re the wind that carries me through.

videos.title: Nothing's gonna bring me down!
videos.description:
#christianmusic #strivetobe #forthestrengthofyouth 

Good Day Short | Christian Music | Strive to Be | #youth

Click the link below to check out the full-length music video! 
https://youtu.be/svWNlwoDEPg

🎵 Follow Strive to Be  
Instagram | https://www.instagram.com/strivetobe/  
Website | https://Youth.ChurchofJesusChrist.org

Amazon Music | https://music.amazon.com/artists/B08C511YNL/strive-to-be 

Are you having a GOOD DAY? Make sure to CHECK OUT this video to help remind you that God loves you, and He is always willing to help you when you’re feeling down.

🎧 Lyrics:

I think I know better
I think I know how it should be 
I got it all planned out
But He’s got a plan for me
When it’s bad weather 
Sometimes I yell up at the sky 
Today was supposed to be dry 
But that’s not what I need

Pre-chorus:
Life’s so unpredictable 
And things might not be going my way 

Chorus: 
But It’s gonna be a good day
Though things are going sideways
I got a smile on my face 
And nothing’s gonna bring me down 
Cause I know
Whatever happens He knows
He’ll never leave me alone 
I’ll be ok
And it’s gonna be a good day

He made all the planets 
He made all the stars in the sky 
He knows what he’s doing 
And he’s gonna make it all right
So when the wind’s blowing 
There might a be reason it is
Something I’m learning 
Something that I’ll never forget 

Pre-chorus:
Life’s so unpredictable 
And things might not be going my way 

Chorus: 
But It’s gonna be a good day
Though things are going sideways
I got a smile on my face 
And nothing’s gonna bring me down 
Cause I know
Whatever happens He knows
He’ll never leave me alone 
I’ll be ok
And it’s gonna be a good day

HAVE YOU LISTENED to this uplifting song, "Next to Me" written and preformed by Nik Day? This song is a great reminder that our Savior is always next to you. During the good and bad times, He is there to lift you up. When have you felt God next to you? Share with us in the comments!

Arranged by Mitch Davis and Todd Thành Trung Trần
Produced by Mitch Davis
Artist: Nik Day

🎧 Lyrics

I can feel You in my heartbeat. 
I can feel You in the air. 
And I know for sure You love me, 
‘Cause You’ve always been there. 

When I need someone to save me,  
I know I don’t have to wait.  
And You’ll stay by my side  
No matter how long,  
how long it takes.  

Chorus:  
Through every single broken heart 
When I’ve fallen on my knees, 
Through every loss, every win, 
I know You’ve always been right next to me. 
Every time I fall apart, 
You’re always there to set me free. 
I feel You when I pray, and 
I know You’re gonna stay  
Right next to me. 
Right next to me. 

Right next to me

There’s not a moment I don’t need You 
More than the air I breathe. 
In all these years I’ve learned to trust You 
‘Cause You’ve stayed with me. 

Chorus:
Through every single broken heart 
When I’ve fallen on my knees, 
Through every loss, every win, 
I know You’ve always been right next to me. 
Every time I fall apart, 
You’re always there to set me free. 
I feel You when I pray, and 
I know You’re gonna stay  
Right next to me. 
Right next to me. 

I can feel You in my heartbeat. 
I can feel You in the air. 
And I know for sure You love me, 
‘Cause You’re always there. 

Final Chorus:
Through every single broken heart 
When I’ve fallen on my knees, 
Through every loss, every win, 
I know You’ve always been right next to me. 
Every time I fall apart, 
You’re always there to set me free. 
I feel You when I pray, and 
I know You’re gonna stay  
Right next to me. 
Right next to me.

Share with us in the comments!

Written by Nik Day 
Arranged by Mitch Davis and Nik Day  
Produced by Mitch Davis 
Artist: Jarica Jamison

🎧 Lyrics:

Through my hills and valleys,
Every storm-tossed sea,
I can feel my Savior
So close to me.

He leads me forward
Through paths unknown,
And when my strength is gone, He heals my weary soul 

Pre-chorus:
And shows me who I could be.
He stays with me,
And I know

Chorus: 
I can do all things.
When I’m sinking in the waves,
If I reach out for His grace,
He will rescue me.
I can do all things
With the Savior by my side.
I can climb to greater heights,
Find the strength I need.
I can do all things with Christ.
I can do all things with Christ.

I will cross that desert
Though it’s far and wide.
When I feel the hunger
And I hear the lies

I will pray to heaven,
And the winds will cease. 
With my Savior as my guide, I know that

Chorus:
I can do all things.
When I’m sinking in the waves,
If I reach out for His grace,
He will rescue me.
I can do all things
With the Savior by my side.
I can climb to greater heights,
Find the strength I need.
I can do all things with Christ.
I can do all things with Christ.

Bridge:
If I’m locked inside a prison cell, He breaks my chains.
When I’m laid into the grave, He rolls the stone away.
When I face my fears and follow Him with all my faith,
He gives me strength. 

Final Chorus:
So I can do all things.
When I’m sinking in the waves,
If I reach out for His grace,
He will rescue me.
I can do all things
With the Savior by my side.
I can climb to greater heights,
Find the strength I need.
I can do all things with Christ.
I can do all things with Christ.

CHECK OUT our new single "Together"! We hope you feel inspired and strengthened as you listen. We are TOGETHER in our commitment to Christ. We celebrate second chances, redemption, and His hope, together. Where have you felt ignited by your faith in Christ? Share with us in the comments! 

Make sure to stream this song on your favorite platform: https://strivetobe.idm.fm/together

Written by Tyler Castleton and McKay Crockett
Arranged by Mykyl, Tyler Castleton, and McKay Crockett
Produced by Mykyl, Tyler Castleton, and McKay Crockett
Artist: Rob Michelson

🎧 Lyrics:

This is a shout to the broken, the one who doubts.
A shout to saints and sinners, just trying to figure it out.  
To every warrior in the fight of your life: fight.  

This is a song to the hiding, to anxious hearts.  
A song to those resigning, just sick of falling apart.  
To every fighter facing battles inside: fight.  

Chorus:

Cuz sparks become a fire when they burn united,  
River rises higher drop by drop.  
Ignited, a star becomes a galaxy forever.  
If we rise, if we fall, we’re together.  
We’re together.  

Here’s a shout to second chances and open doors.  
A shout that echos into a soul that’s hungry for more.  
To every hero in the dark of the night: there is light.  

Chorus:

Cuz sparks become a fire when they burn united,  
River rises higher drop by drop.  
Ignited, a star becomes a galaxy forever.  
If we rise, if we fall, we’re together.  
We’re together.  

We all hurt, we all cry, we’re together.  
We all sin, we all try, we’re together.  
We all fail, we all fall, we're together.  
But there’s One, through it all, keeps us together.  

We all hurt, we all cry, we’re together.  
We all sin, we all try, we’re together.  
We all fail, we all fall, we’re together.  
He’s the One, through it all, keeps us together.  

Final Chorus:

Cuz sparks become a fire when they burn united,  
River rises higher drop by drop.  
Ignited, a star becomes a galaxy forever.  
If we rise, if we fall.

Cuz sparks become a fire.
We all hurt, we all cry, river rises higher. 
A star becomes a galaxy forever.  
He’s the One, through it all, keeps us together.

Going through the motions,

Take off those dark sunglasses,

Leave your worries behind.
This is an invitation

It’s a celebration,
Let’s celebrate tonight.
Celebrate,

Celebrate.

Jump up to the ceiling,
You don’t need a reason,

Life is such a blessing,
Show a little faith, it’s

Take off those dark sunglasses,

There’s really one big reason

So that You could feel my pain.
You’re the only one that loves me
Like no one else loves me,
And no one could do what You’ve done. 
You’re the only one.
You’re the only one.

🎧 Lyrics

Then you need Him now.

Feel His light

Make it bright, what once was dark.

And your light runs low,  
Got nowhere to go, 
Then you need Him now.
Wherever you’ve been,
Put your faith in Him.

"Eternal" | Official Track Video | feat. Jenn B and Oba Bonner | #strivetobe | Youth Christian Music 

TUNE IN to hear our newest single, "Eternal".  We hope you feel the Savior's love as you listen and know that because of Him, you are ETERNAL. Make sure to stream this song on your favorite platform: https://strivetobe.idm.fm/eternal

Written by Nik Day and Oba Bonner
Arranged by Mitch Davis and Todd Trần
Produced by Mitch Davis
Artist: Jenn B and Oba Bonner

🎧 Lyrics:

If everything around me, everything me around me fades,
I won’t disappear, oh I could never drift away.
There’s a reason I am here,
And I will last a million years.
That’s the way He made me; nothing’s gonna take my place.
Oh.

Chorus:

I am eternal.
I am a child—I am a child of light.
My heart is burning.
I am on fire
I’m glowing bright, bright, bright.
There’s a feeling in my soul.
I know
I am eternal.
I am eternal.

There is something inside me
Glowing like lightning,
And it’s almost blinding.
You can always find me.
Even through the darkness,
I will keep shining.
Oh,
’Cause I’m brighter than gold.
Hey.
’Cause He made me that way.
He made me that way.
Ay ay.

Chorus:

I am eternal.
I am a child—I am a child of light.
My heart is burning.
I am on fire
I’m glowing bright, bright, bright.
There’s a feeling in my soul.
I know
I am eternal.
I am eternal.

Bridge:

I could never lay low.
Glowing like a halo,
I’ma let the world know
I am eternal.
It’s all because the one who made me
Called me by my name and it changed me.
Like fire in the freezing cold,
He’s the one that put the breath of life into my soul.
Yeah.
Multiply by the reciprocal,
And by my calculations I will live forever; it’s a miracle.

Chorus:

I am eternal.
I am a child—I am a child of light.
My heart is burning.
I am on fire
I’m glowing bright, bright, bright.
There’s a feeling in my soul.
I know
I am eternal.
I am eternal.

One True Hope | Official Track Video | feat. Yahosh Bonner | Christian Music

Written by Nik Day
Arranged by Mitch Davis, Nik Day, and Shaun Barrowes
Produced by Mitch Davis
Artist: Yahosh Bonner

🎧 Lyrics:

You are the sun that rises 
After an endless night, 
My water in the desert,  
The fire that’s burning bright. 
When currents pull me under, 
You bring me back onto the shore. 

You chase away the shadows, 
You calm my hurricanes, 
You make my oceans shallow, 
So I can face the waves. 
You give me strength to follow 
When you lead me through the storm. 

Chorus: 

You are my hope, 
My only hope. 
You saved my soul. 
You saved my soul. 
You are my light 
In the darkest night.  
You lead me home  
Through the unknown,  
My one true hope. 

When thunder rolls around me, 
You are my healing rain. 
You wash away my troubles 
And make me whole again. 
I’ll follow You forever, 
The one who wipes my tears away  
And gives me strength. 

Chorus 

You are my hope, 
My only hope. 
You saved my soul. 
You saved my soul. 
You are my light 
In the darkest night.  
You lead me home  
Through the unknown,  
My one true hope. 

Every time I think that my hope is gone, 
You’re the only thing that gives me strength to carry on. 
And You lift me up, and You pull me through. 
Yes, it’s all because of You, You, You. 

Chorus 

You are my hope, 
My only hope. 
You saved my soul. 
You saved my soul. 
You are my light 
In the darkest night.  
You lead me home  
Through the unknown,  
My one true hope.

Disciple of Christ | Official 2024 Theme Song feat. Benjamin Josiah | Youth Christian Music

Written by Nik Day
Arranged by Mike McClellan
Produced by Mike McClellan and Mitch Davis
Artist: Benjamin Josiah

🎧 Lyrics

When the stars burn out and the strong winds come, 
I will lift my eyes to the rising sun. 
He is the Prince of Peace; 
He steadies my soul. 
I am his hands and feet. 
The whole world will know. 

Chorus: 
I’m a disciple of Christ; 
I will never leave him. 
He is the truth and the life; 
He’s the strength in my weakness. 
I will shine ’til the whole world sees 
He’s the light that will set us free. 
I’m a disciple of Christ. 

Out of all the paths that I could take, 
Giving Him my life was the only way. 
He is my fire by night,  
The air in each breath. 
So I’ll stand and testify  
Again and again.

🎧 Lyrics

I've heard the stories all my life, 
The Prince of Peace, the Son of God, the source of endless light. 
He healed the sick and calmed the sea, 
He puts to rest the thundering waves inside of me. 

He rescued me,  
He set me free. 

Chorus: 

Beautiful Savior, 
The Way, the Truth divine.  
King and Deliverer, 
Redeemer of mankind.  
All of His many names 
Show His power and grace. 
He’s the Light, my healer, my guide,  
The Savior of my soul.    

Broken people, perfect love. 
He paved the way and paid the price so we could rise above  
The bands of death and find relief. 
With selfless pain, He bore His cross on Calvary. 

He rescued me,  
He set me free. 

Chorus 

Beautiful Savior, 
The Way, the Truth divine.  
King and Deliverer, 
Redeemer of mankind.  
All of His many names 
Show His power and grace. 
He’s the Light, my healer, my guide,  
The Savior of my soul.  

I will spend this life 
Giving all my time, 
Living line by line till I see  
How He’d trade His throne for a crown of thorns,  
And He did it all for me. 

Chorus 

Beautiful Savior, 
The Way, the Truth divine.  
King and Deliverer, 
Redeemer of mankind.  
All of His many names 
Show His power and grace. 
He’s the Light, my healer, my guide,  
The Savior of my soul.

Artist: James Thorup

🎧 Lyrics:

I’m tending to my garden, 
A few things I need to change. 
There ain’t a petal that’s too far gone. 

The grass is greener.  
The roses started blooming. 
Pulled the weeds out of my soul; I feel brand new. 

Chorus

Tonight 
I call off the inner fight,  
Allow the saving Light to shine  
Over my dying flowers and breathe in life, 
Born again and cleansed with Living Water. 

I’m picking up my pieces, 
Restoring my frame, 
Becoming whole through loving grace. 

I’m changing lenses from black and white 
To opened eyes, 
And now the world I saw before is full of color. 

Chorus 

Tonight 
I call off the inner fight,  
Allow the saving Light to shine  
Over my dying flowers and breathe in life, 
Born again and cleansed with Living Water. 

If someday I will stand before the one who saved me, 
I wanna be there blamelessly 
And hear how proud He is of who I’ve become. 
So every day I’ll heed the calling in my soul, 
Saying come unto me, my son. 

Chorus 

Tonight 
I call off the inner fight,  
Allow the saving Light to shine  
Over my dying flowers and breathe in life, 
Born again and cleansed with Living Water.

I was searching for a glimmer of light.

Trying to do it on my own, but I’ve been hurting inside.  
But I know You started the fire, 
Gave me Your hand to hold.

held me like I was gold.

Calm the waves when they’re pulling me under.  
When I found You, I found myself. 
 
From the ashes I’m refined by the fire.  
Yeah, I found a new perspective when You opened my eyes. 
From my low lows to my highest of highs,  
I never walk alone.  
 
When I’m tossed and turned by the ocean, 
Your love pulls me to the surface. 
Now I have You as my compass, 
Show me where to go. 
 
Chorus 

Yeah, You. 
Looking back on my life,  
At the darkest of times 
There was You. 
You took my broken soul,  
held me like I was gold. 
It was You. 
I was stranded 
When You gave me shelter. 
Calm the waves when they’re pulling me under.  
When I found You, I found myself.

Looking back on my life,  
At the darkest of times 
There was You. 
You took my broken soul,  
held me like I was gold. 
It was You. 
I was stranded 
When You gave me shelter. 
Calm the waves when they’re pulling me under.  
When I found You, I found myself.

videos.description:
A reminder through song that you you are wanted, beloved, and divine to God. Seek to understand your worth by seeking Him. #strivetobe #discipleofchrist #jesuschrist 

The world might drag you down but remember, you are BELOVED to the Savior. 

Make sure to stream the album on your favorite platform: https://strivetobe.idm.fm/disciple-of-christ

🎵 Follow Strive to Be 
Instagram | https://www.instagram.com/strivetobe/ 
Website | Youth.ChurchofJesusChrist.org 
YouTube | https://www.youtube.com/strivetobe 
Apple Music | https://apple.co/2CJ1Y4M 
Spotify | https://open.spotify.com/artist/66YzHdK0FWCQSKMlXf3Rbj 

Written by Connor Austin, Luz Ysabelle Cuevas, and Nik Day
Arranged by Gavin McMahan, Mitch Davis, and Todd Trần
Produced by Gavin McMahan and Mitch Davis
Artist: Ysabelle Cuevas

Beloved (Reimagined) | Official Track Video| Christian Music

🎧 Lyrics:

I’ve seen the photographs; I’ve seen the women on my screens. 
It’s heavy on my mind why they seem happier than me. 
And I’ve been running ’round, 
Chasing down who I think I should be, 
Who I should be. 

It keeps me up at night. 
These expectations always seem  
Too heavy, how can I  
Find truth when it’s so hard to see? 
Cause it’s like trying to find  
A drop inside an ocean far too deep. 
Hmm 

But then I hear You 
When I feel alone. 
Your voice can heal me,  
Save me from myself. 
You take my weight  
And carry it away. 

Chorus:

And I remember  
I’m beloved. I’m divine— 
Divine in nature, 
And I’m perfectly designed. 
When I don’t feel wanted, 
You call me beloved. 

I tune the noises out, 
And in the silence I can see 
You love me more than life, 
And Your love is all the hope I need.  
The proof is in the stars  
And in the scars You took for all of me.  

Sometimes I hear You 
When I feel alone. 
Your voice can heal me, 
Save me from myself. 
I know who I am 
No matter where I go. 

Chorus: 

And I remember  
I’m beloved. I’m divine— 
Divine in nature, 
And I’m perfectly designed. 
When I don’t feel wanted, 
You call me beloved. 

My scars don’t make me who I am. 
Oh, they just tell my story. 
The imperfections fade away,  
And You help me see the beauty. 
My scars don’t make me who I am. 
Oh, they just tell my story. 
The imperfections fade away,  
Fade away. 

Chorus: 

And I remember  
I’m beloved. I’m divine— 
Divine in nature, 
And I’m perfectly designed. 
When I don’t feel wanted, 
You call me beloved.

videos.title: Savior of My Soul feat. Ellie Barry | Christian Music
videos.description:
Listen as Ellie testifies through song about Christ's PERFECT love for you! 
#strivetobe #gospelmusic #christianmusic #ldsmusic #jesuschrist 

Whatever we are going through, Jesus can be our guide. He is The Way, the Truth, the Light, the SAVIOR of our souls! How have you seen Christ in your life?  Share with us in the comments! 

🎵 Follow Strive to Be 
Instagram | https://www.instagram.com/strivetobe/ 
Website | Youth.ChurchofJesusChrist.org 
YouTube | https://www.youtube.com/strivetobe 
Apple Music | https://apple.co/2CJ1Y4M 
Spotify | https://open.spotify.com/artist/66YzHdK0FWCQSKMlXf3Rbj 

Savior of My Soul feat. Ellie Barry | Christian Music 

Written by Connor Austin, Luz Ysabelle Cuevas, and Nik Day
Arranged by Daniel Blomberg, Dave Zimmerman, Mitch Davis, and Sean Thatcher Hubrich
Produced by Mitch Davis
Artist: Ellie Barry 


🎧 Lyrics

I've heard the stories all my life, 
The Prince of Peace, the Son of God, the source of endless light. 
He healed the sick and calmed the sea, 
He puts to rest the thundering waves inside of me. 

He rescued me,  
He set me free. 

Chorus

Beautiful Savior, 
The Way, the Truth divine.  
King and Deliverer, 
Redeemer of mankind.  
All of His many names 
Show His power and grace. 
He’s the Light, my healer, my guide,  
The Savior of my soul.    

Broken people, perfect love. 
He paved the way and paid the price so we could rise above  
The bands of death and find relief. 
With selfless pain, He bore His cross on Calvary. 

He rescued me,  
He set me free. 

Chorus 

Beautiful Savior, 
The Way, the Truth divine.  
King and Deliverer, 
Redeemer of mankind.  
All of His many names 
Show His power and grace. 
He’s the Light, my healer, my guide,  
The Savior of my soul.  

I will spend this life 
Giving all my time, 
Living line by line till I see  
How He’d trade His throne for a crown of thorns,  
And He did it all for me. 

Chorus 

Beautiful Savior, 
The Way, the Truth divine.  
King and Deliverer, 
Redeemer of mankind.  
All of His many names 
Show His power and grace. 
He’s the Light, my healer, my guide,  
The Savior of my soul.

Diamond | Official Music Video feat. Nik Day | Christian Music

Written by Nik Day
Arranged by Mitch Davis and Todd Trần
Produced by Mitch Davis
Artist: Nik Day
Video directed and shot by Chris Jordan

🎧 Lyrics

When you feel the weight of the world on your shoulders, 
When gravity’s pulling you down from the light, 
Don’t ever forget when it seems it’s the hardest, 
That’s when you rise to the highest of heights. 

When you climb out of the cave you’re in, you’ll finally understand 
That the One who made you always holds you in His perfect hands. 

Chorus: 

You are, 
You are a Diamond. 
So bright, treasured, and priceless, 
A timeless work of art. 
We see the gleam inside your heart. 
When you feel under pressure,  
It’s just making you stronger.  
Remember you were born for this.  
You are a Diamond.  

So let Him in, let Him mold you and change you. 
He’ll make you more than you’d be on your own. 
All that He wants is to shape and refine you, 
So you shine His light when He needs you the most.  

Chorus 

You are, 
You are a Diamond. 
So bright, treasured, and priceless, 
A timeless work of art. 
We see the gleam inside your heart. 
When you feel under pressure,  
It’s just making you stronger.  
Remember you were born for this.  
You are a Diamond.  

So shine on, 
Stay strong, 
Hold on.  
You’ve got what it takes, 
Just keep the faith and  
Shine on, 
Stay strong, 
Hold on.  
Hold on.  

Chorus 

You are, 
You are a Diamond. 
So bright, treasured, and priceless, 
A timeless work of art. 
We see the gleam inside your heart. 
When you feel under pressure,  
It’s just making you stronger.  
Remember you were born for this.  
You are a Diamond.

Stronger | Official Track Video feat. James Thorup | Christian Music

Written by Nik Day 
Arranged and Produced by Mitch Davis and Todd Trần 
Artist: James Thorup

🎧 Lyrics

I keep You close to me; 
You’re like the burning sun, 
Shining bright, bright, bright, 
And You power me with love. 
I feel Your energy flowing through my veins, 
And You fight, fight, fight, every battle that I face. 

Oh, 
I’ll never, never, never, let you go. 
You’re all I need. 

Chorus: 

When I’m weak 
I know you will make me stronger, 
Stronger. 
When I’m beat 
You carry me through troubled waters, 
Waters. 
It’s like every single time 
I feel like giving up, 
You fill me with Your light 
And You save me with Your love. 
When I’m weak 
I know You will make me stronger, 
Stronger. 

I hear the thunder roll across the purple sky, 
And it’s dark, dark, dark, 
But You never leave my side. 
I feel Your guiding light fill my soul with peace 
And I know, know, know,  
You’re my shelter, my relief. 

Oh, 
I’ll never, never, never, let you go. 
You’re all I need. 

Chorus: 

When I’m weak 
I know you will make me stronger, 
Stronger. 
When I’m beat 
You carry me through troubled waters, 
Waters. 
It’s like every single time 
I feel like giving up, 
You fill me with Your light 
And You save me with Your love. 
When I’m weak 
I know You will make me stronger, 
Stronger. 

You build, build, build, me up. 
You make me more than I would be 
If it were only up to me. 
You give, give, give, me love 
The kind of love that never leaves. 
You give me hope ’cause I believe. 

Chorus: 

When I’m weak 
I know you will make me stronger, 
Stronger. 
When I’m beat 
You carry me through troubled waters, 
Waters. 
It’s like every single time 
I feel like giving up, 
You fill me with Your light 
And You save me with Your love. 
When I’m weak 
I know You will make me stronger, 
Stronger.

All the smoke and the mirrors  
Try to leave me confused,  
But I won’t let it deceive me.  
I know what is true.  
There’s a God who made me,  
And He shines through the dark.  
He helps me see all I can be.

I fight for truth  
In a world full of lies.  
With all of my might,  
I strive for truth,

When He calls out my name, 
I won’t be afraid. 
I’ll stand for truth. 
I stand for truth. 

There’s a truth that was spoken,  
Long before we were made.  
It sets love into motion,  
And it can never be changed.  
There’s a million voices,  
But only one is the way.  
He guides my soul and gives me hope. 

Chorus 

I stand for truth. 
I fight for truth  
In a world full of lies.  
With all of my might,  
I strive for truth,

In my soul 
There's an endless light, never fleeting 
It’s pure 
It’s a simple truth filled with meaning

How do I offer the strength I’ve found? 
Like mist on the water clears  
The mountain is tall, but I'll stand my ground

the key to inner peace, He will unlock the door  
I will be the man He sees in me, I'll try each day  
He chose me to light the way

J’avance avec foi. 
Que ma vie reflète 
La lumière en moi . 
  
Le pouvoir de Dieu  
M’ouvre la voie  
Et les jours ténébreux  
Ne m’effraient pas.

I was searching for a glimmer of light. 
I’ve been running ’round the desert in the dead of the night,  
Still hoping for a star in the sky 
To show me to my home.

Trying to do it on my own, but I’ve been hurting inside.  
But I know You started the fire, 
Gave me Your hand to hold. 
 
Chorus

Yeah, You. 
Looking back on my life,  
At the darkest of times 
There was You. 
You took my broken soul,  
held me like I was gold. 
It was You. 
I was stranded 
When You gave me shelter. 
Calm the waves when they’re pulling me under.  
When I found You, I found myself. 
 
From the ashes I’m refined by the fire.  
Yeah, I found a new perspective when You opened my eyes. 
From my low lows to my highest of highs,  
I never walk alone.  
 
When I’m tossed and turned by the ocean, 
Your love pulls me to the surface. 
Now I have You as my compass, 
Show me where to go. 
 
Chorus

Looking back on my life,  
At the darkest of times 
There was You. 
You took my broken soul,  
Held me like I was gold. 
It was You. 
I was stranded 
When You gave me shelter. 
Calm the waves when they’re pulling me under.

Looking back on my life,  
At the darkest of times 
There was You. 
You took my broken soul,  
Held me like I was gold. 
It was You. 
I was stranded 
When You gave me shelter. 
Calm the waves when they’re pulling me under.  
When I found You, I found myself.

videos.description:
Heavenly Father gives us mercy, peace, shelter, and relief. He is always there to pick us up and mend our broken pieces.  #strivetobe #discipleofchrist #jesuschrist

🎧 Lyrics:

Said it was the last time then, but here we are, oh 
Went and messed it up again, have I gone too far? Oh 

How many second chances do I get, I’m scared I’m 
Far too late to change myself, is this the end? 
I gotta get it off my chest, before I fall apart 

Chorus 

Will you come gather me 
And pick up every piece 
Even when I feel like I’m undeserving 
You show me love and you stop the hurting 
Gather me 

You tell me not to be afraid, ‘cause with your grace 
Every day’s another chance for me to change 

You can free me from the demons that hold me down 
And save me from my worst mistakes, help me to turn around 

I thought no one could reach me but now I’m found 
Thought that I was fallen but you pick me off the ground 

Chorus

Will you come gather me 
And pick up every piece 
Even when I feel like I’m undeserving 
You show me love and you stop the hurting 
Gather me

You give me mercy 
You give me peace 
You give me shelter 
Give me relief 

Now I feel weightless 
I feel so free 
Because you rescued, rescued me 

Chorus

Will you come gather me 
And pick up every piece 
Even when I feel like I’m undeserving 
You show me love and you stop the hurting 
Gather me

Our 2025 theme "Look Unto Christ," comes from the scripture Doctrine and Covenants 6:36: “Look unto me in every thought; doubt not, fear not.” No matter what difficult moments you face this year, as you choose faith in Jesus Christ, and strive to look towards Him, you will experience the joy only He can offer.

Don’t be afraid. 
There’s a star that’s always lighting the way,  
And there’s someone who can ease all the pain 
In your heart.  
Oh, you’re not alone. 
Doesn’t matter how far you go, 
There will always be a hand you can hold.  
Fear not.  

When you’re scared of the shadows in your head, 
Wanna get out of your bed,  
But you can’t  
’Cause all you feel is weight on your chest and your shoulders,  
Wond’ring when it will be over.  

There is someone who felt the way you feel  
And knows how He can heal your soul.  
He’ll take all of the fears that you have, and He’ll hold you,  
And He will start to mold you.

Bright as the morning sun.  
You’ll have the courage of ten thousand armies 
And the power to overcome.

Because of the Savior's perfect love, He suffered and died for us. Through His Resurrection, we’re promised life again. This Easter season, let's celebrate the Savior's life, sacrifice, and resurrection. He is risen!

Because He Lives (feat. Nik Day) | Official Track Video | Christian Music 

Written by Carrie Yost, Darla Day, Nik Day
Arranged by  Landon Alley, Mitch Davis, Todd Trần
Produced by Landon Alley, Mitch Davis, Todd Trần
Artist: Nik Day

🎧 Lyrics

I carry a debt I could never repay.
I’d be locked in a prison with all my mistakes
If it wasn’t for love and the infinite price
That was paid when He suffered and He laid down His life.

I can feel Him
Healing my heart as I pray,
With His grace.

Chorus

Because He lives, because He died,
I am redeemed by my Savior Jesus Christ.
I lift my voice up to the sky,
And I will forever praise His name on high.
Because He lives,
Because He lives,
So will I.

He prayed for the world
As He shed tears and blood.
Then the King of creation
Was nailed to the cross.
But death was defeated,
The stone rolled away,
The prison was opened,
And everything changed.

Chorus:

Because He lives, because He died,
I am redeemed by my Savior Jesus Christ.
I lift my voice up to the sky,
And I will forever praise His name on high.
Because He lives,
Because He lives,
So will I.

Chorus: 

And I will live because He died.
I am redeemed by my Savior Jesus Christ.
I lift my voice up to the sky,
And I will forever praise His name on high.
Because He lives,
Because He lives,
So will I.
